select t.type_code as pact_type_code,w.pact_end_w,t.type_name from PACT_WARN_SET_SKXY w RIGHT JOIN PACT_TYPE_SKXY t ON w.PACT_TYPE = t.TYPE_CODE AND w.GROUP_ID = t.GROUP_ID AND w.HOS_ID = t.HOS_ID AND w.COPY_CODE=t.COPY_CODE where t.group_id=#{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and t.hos_id=#{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and t.copy_code=#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ( t.type_name like '%'||#{type_name}||'%' or t.type_code like '%'||#{type_name}||'%' )
and exists ( select 1 from v_user_data_perm c where t.group_id=c.group_id and t.hos_id=c.hos_id and t.type_code = c.perm_code and user_id=#{user_id} AND TABLE_CODE = 'PACT_TYPE_SKXY' and c.is_write = 1
union all
select 1 from v_user_data_perm d where t.group_id=d.group_id and t.hos_id=d.hos_id and t.type_code = d.perm_code and user_id=#{user_id} AND TABLE_CODE = 'PACT_TYPE_SKXY' and d.is_read = 1 ) and t.is_stop = 0
